bt.Model

Class Request

  • java.lang.Object
    • bt.Model.Request
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    WeightedRequest

     class Request
extends java.lang.Object
    This class serves as an immutable storage object for an incoming request.
    Author:
    Isaac Yochelson, Robert Schomburg and Fernando Geraci

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Request(int index, int begin, int length)
      This is the only constructor for this class because an object of this type without these fields would lack meaning.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Request

        Request(int index,
       int begin,
       int length)
        This is the only constructor for this class because an object of this type without these fields would lack meaning.
        Parameters:
        index - Index of the piece of the file being requested.
        begin - Byte offset into the piece from which the requested byte array should begin.
        length - Length of the byte array being requested.

    • Method Detail

        Get the index from this object

        Get the beginning byte offset of the requested byte array.

      • getLength

        Get the requested byte array length.
